doc:
Chard Hayward https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chard_Hayward 0 Chard Hayward (Roy Hayward, born 1949), is an Welsh Australian television actor, director and producer, he is best known for his long-running role of camp barman Dudley Butterfield in the 1970s television soap opera Number 96. Since the early 90s he has been based in the US. Chard_Hayward ( Roy_Hayward , born 1949 ) , is an_Welsh_Australian_television_actor , director_and_producer , he is_best_known for his_long-running_role of camp_barman_Dudley_Butterfield in the_1970s_television_soap_opera_Number_96 . Since the_early_90s he has_been_based in the_US .
